alert.note: Alert for Cleburne (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 2:22AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Cleburne County through 245 AM CDT... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Abernathy, or 7 miles east of Heflin, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Heflin, Fruithurst, Edwardsville, Muscadine, Abernathy, Mars Hills, Trickem, I 20 Welcome Center, Oak Level, Borden Springs and Coleman Lake And Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Alabama.
